name: guam
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an island in Micronesia that is a US territory but has its own government: Guam became a US Territory in December of 1898. Halfway between Guam and Vietnam, we experienced engine trouble.
More examplesFewer examplesThe beetle caused the loss of more than 50% of all coconut palm trees on the island of Guam.We just got word that the tsunami warning has been lifted for Guam.Bill 248, which would authorize charter schools on Guam, will be heard at 4 p.m.
